content: Compose a paragraph using only words beginning with the letter 'b'.

Bold black bears blissfully bounced beneath big, beautiful birch branches. Beaming brightly, they exhibited boundless bravery, building bulwarks against bleak battles. Beneath blustery breezes, bears bred bravely, birthing bundles of bubbly bear cubs. These bundles blossomed beautifully, basking in boundless brotherly bonds. Bountiful berries and beans bolstered their buoyant bodies, boosting their brawny build. Boldly breaking barriers, these bears broadened their boundaries, basking in boundless beauty of their bewitching biomes.
